name: Geopocalypse
description:
Geopocalypse is an endless runner, compromised of hidden dangers and deadly traps.

🔰How long can you survive?
Are you fast enough?

Put your skills to test with Geopocalypse's engaging and tricky gameplay

The longer you play, the faster it gets, and the harder it is to survive

🔰How long will you be able to survive in this thrilling platformer filled with 20+ tricky traps

With the darkness come many hidden dangers, will you be able to survive?

🤾🏻‍♂️Jump and slide your way out of danger.

🔰Want to make your gameplay more mesmerizing?
➡️There are many skins available to add some personal touch to the game.
➡️Exquisite trails to mark your path through the dark.

🔥Collect as many coins as you can.

🔥Use Power-Ups to help you in your journey

Stay tuned with Us On:
